# Pull Request

## Description
Please include a short description of the change and the reasoning behind it.

**Type of change:**
- [ ] protocol
- [ ] docs
- [ ] test
- [ ] chore
- [ ] other

## Related COPILOT.md directives
Include reference if the PR touches AI behavior or protocol rules.

## Testing
- Describe any tests included
- Include unit tests demonstrating correctness (resonance thresholds, timing, etc.)
- CI will run full test suite automatically

## Checklist
- [ ] Branch named according to CONTRIBUTING.md guidelines
- [ ] Commit messages follow required prefixes
- [ ] No persistence/logging introduced
- [ ] Deterministic serialization maintained
- [ ] AI-generated code marked and COPILOT.md-compliant

## Reviewer notes
Provide any additional context for reviewers.
